name: Bouncing Sun
description:
NOTE: WEBGL VERSION IS KINDA GARBAGE. I strongly reccomend the pc build if you like what you see.

Bouncing Sun has you master the controls of a paper airplane, diving and weaving through a challenging musical hellscape of air vents and obscure references.

Made in 2 days (originally, 1.1 took an extra day) for a play design class. Featuring the musical stylings ofAustin Heller, fellow Bear Vegas member.

Listen to the OST here on Soundcloud.
